# portkey_prompt_collection (Data Source)

Use this data source to get information about a Portkey prompt collection.

## Example Usage

```terraform
# Look up a collection by ID
data "portkey_prompt_collection" "example" {
  id = "collection-uuid-here"
}

# Use the collection data
output "collection_name" {
  value = data.portkey_prompt_collection.example.name
}

output "collection_slug" {
  value = data.portkey_prompt_collection.example.slug
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `id` (String) The ID of the collection to look up.

### Read-Only

- `created_at` (String) Timestamp when the collection was created.
- `is_default` (Boolean) Whether this is the default collection for the workspace.
- `last_updated_at` (String) Timestamp when the collection was last updated.
- `name` (String) Name of the collection.
- `parent_collection_id` (String) Parent collection ID for nested collections.
- `slug` (String) URL-friendly identifier for the collection.
- `status` (String) Collection status (active, archived).
- `workspace_id` (String) Workspace ID where this collection belongs.
